מגיפות ימשיכו לקרות.
  אנו עוזרים לקהילות להתכונן ולהגיב.

aboutUs.story: is the brainchild of Manuel Gonzalez Alzuru, who was infected with COVID-19 in France. Upon returning home to Barcelona, he found that he was unable to get help even though there were people who wanted to help.
aboutUs.community: We are built by a team of 1100+ volunteer developers, designers, scientists, health experts, and product managers from around the world.
aboutUs.heading: אנחנו רוצים ליצור עולם שבו בני אדם עמידים יותר למקרי חירום
aboutUs.subHeading: על ידי עזרה לקהילות להגיב במהירות וביעילות רבה יותר למשברים.
aboutUs.forWho: כל אחד או כל סוג של עסק, קבוצה קהילתית, ממשלה או ארגון בריאות אשר זקוק או רוצה להעניק עזרה.
aboutUs.storyInspired: בהשראת כל כך הרבה אנשים שהתכנסו יחד, השיק מנואל את הפרויקט מתוך מטרה אחת: כדי להבטיח שאחרים יוכלו להתחבר בזמן.
aboutUs.connect: פלטפורמה אלטרואיסטית לחיבור בין הזקוקים לעזרה לבין מי שיכול לספק אותה.
aboutUs.helpBoardDetail: פלטפורמה קהילתית ליחידים ולארגונים להציע ולבקש סיוע.
aboutUs.localGlobalDetail: הצע ובקש עזרה בקהילה שלי ובעולם.
aboutUs.relevantContentDetail: תקופות תפוגה מבטיחות שהלוח תמיד מעודכן.
aboutUs.thanksSupporters: תודה לתומכינו, בלעדיהם לא נוכל לעזור לקהילות להתכונן ולהגיב למגפות.
aboutUs.becomeSupporter: למידע נוסף על האופן שבו עסקך יכול להיות תומך, אנא צרו קשר עם צוות השותפויות שלנו בכתובת
aboutUs.companyLogoInfo: לחץ על הלוגו של החברה כדי לעבור לאתר של התומך.
aboutUs.pressInfo: אם אתה חבר בתקשורת, צור קשר ב
aboutUs.communityCollaboration: We want to empower communities and organizations across the world through our platform, and in order to do that, we need to work together! Ongoing collaboration with our community partners allows us to build a better platform for them, and for others.
aboutUs.becomeCommunityPartner: Would you like your community to be our partner as well? We'd love to hear from you and start collaborating! Reach out at
aboutUs.bookCallInfo: Looking to have a personal experience with our product? Schedule a call with us!

footer.copyright: זכויות יוצרים {{currentYear}} FightPandemics. כל הזכויות שמורות.

faq.title: אודות FightPandemics / כללי
general: מה זה FightPandemics?
FightPandemics is a platform created amid the COVID-19 outbreak with the aim to be a go-to place for people affected in many ways by the pandemic.

Our main mission is to connect individuals and organizations offering and requesting help amid pandemic crisis, in a local and global level. No matter if you seek medical help, facial masks, legal help, groceries, someone to walk your dog or support with any other day-to-day activities, you can look for it here:

We strive to gather essential information that is highly fragmented, connecting in one network individuals, communities and organizations working on pandemic-related issues or projects. Our vision is to create a world where everyone is more resilient to emergencies, by helping communities respond more quickly and effectively to health emergencies and humanitarian crises.
מיהו FightPandemics?

FightPandemics is an all-volunteer, global team with a mission to serve as a go-to place for help. Our team is made up of 150+ engaged volunteers from 70+ countries striving to make a difference. The platform was built in an innovative collaborative effort, bringing together a diverse group of problem solvers with a wide range of skills willing to co-create and learn with one another.
Do you want to join our initiative? Reach out to <0>hr@fightpandemics.com</0>
באילו ערים FightPandemics פועלת?
FightPandemics is a global platform. Our first version has been launched in English, but we have plans to add other languages soon.
למי מיועד FightPandemics?
Anyone needing or offering help is welcome to join our platform and connect with other individuals and organizations.
כיצד ניתן לפרסם הצעה או בקשה לעזרה ב-FightPandemics?

<0>When you join the community, you will have unlimited access to view and create posts and comments on FightPandemics platform.</0><1>To join the community as a user, click the "Menu" button and select the "Join Now/Sign In" option. There you will be able to join with your choice of email or social media credentials.</1><2>Once you have completed your profile, select the menu button, select view my profile and click on the plus button to create your first post.</2>
כיצד אוכל להתעדכן בחדשות FightPandemics?
Please follow us on social media! We post regular updates to <0>Facebook</0>, <1>Twitter</1>, <2>LinkedIn</2>, and <3>Instagram</3>.
האם עלי לשלם כדי להשתמש ב- FightPandemics?
No, FightPandemics is a completely free platform run by volunteers.
איזה סוג עזרה אוכל להציע / לבקש ב- FightPandemics?

You're welcome to ask for and offer any type of help to support individuals and organizations cope during the COVID-19 pandemic. Here is a list with some examples of the type of help you can offer or request:

< 0 > מצרכים < / 0 > < 1 > ציוד רפואי < / 1 > < 2 > סיוע משפטי < / 2 > < 3 > תמיכה טכנית < / 3 > < 4 > מידע < / 4 > < 5 > מימון < / 5 > < 6 > אירועים ופעילויות < / 6 > < 7 > חינוך < / 7 > < 8 > בריאות < / 8 > < 9 > מחקר ופיתוח < / 9 >
כיצד אוכל למצוא עזרה?

From the FightPandemics homepage, select "Request help". If you choose "Other help", you'll enter your location and be directed to a page with the help offers in the selected area. You can then filter the postings that you want to see also by provider and type. Alternatively, you can select "View community postings" from the main page to view all postings and apply the desired filters.
כיצד אוכל להציע עזרה?

<0>You can offer help as an individual or as an organization.</0><1>From the homepage, select "Give help" to see all the posts created by users asking for help and filter the results by location and type. You need to be signed in to reach out to them. You can also create your own postings describing the help you're able to offer.</1>
Do I need to be signed in to view help requests and offers?
You do not need to be signed in to view any of the postings on the help board, but you will need to sign in to comment or like a post.
Do I need to be signed in to create/edit posts?
Yes, you need to create an account and sign in if you want to create or edit posts.
Do I need to be signed up as an individual to create organization profiles?
Yes, once you are signed up as an individual, you can create one or multiple organizational profile linked to your account.
האם השם שלי /שם ארגון שלי יוצג בפני משתמשים אחרים?
When you create posts either offering or seeking help, your name/ your organization's name is displayed to anyone viewing the help board.
How can I trust that the posts are reliable?

Unfortunately, we cannot ensure that all postings are reliable, since the posts are created by our users. However we make our best to keep the content relevant, by doing regular data cleansing and by deactivating posts after their expiration. If you have concerns about the content of a post please contact us at <0>support@fightpandemics.com</0>
תכול לעזור לי עם בעיות רפואיות?
FightPandemics is not a medical care provider.
האם עלי לשתף את המיקום הנוכחי שלי? מה אם אני לא רוצה לשתף את המיקום שלי?

We use location to show you the most relevant results, however, you may also view all postings. Since FightPandemics has thousands of postings from all over, we suggest you enter a location near you to best tailor results.
אין עזרה רשומה באזור שלי. מה אני עושה ?

Our community is always growing. You're welcome to be the first one in your area to create a post and ask for help. Please also take a look in the services that are accessible to anyone independently of their location.
I found a bug on the website. How do I report that?
Please submit feedback, or contact <0>support@fightpandemics.com.</0>
אני כבר לא מורשה להשתמש ב- FightPandemics - מה אני עושה?
Please reach out to us at <0>support@fightpandemics.com</0> and we will check what is the issue with your account.
איזה מידע אתה שומר?

FightPandemics collects and processes users personal data only for the purposes described in our <0>privacy policy.</0> In no case we will provide access or share your personal data with any third party, except with the relevant persons set forth in this policy.
האם ניתן לתת/לקבל עזרה מהעיר או מהמדינה שלי? כמה זמן הפוסט יהיה גלוי?
The post to give/receive help can be at a zip code, city, state or country level for a duration of a day, a week, a month or forever. By default, the posts will be set to city level for one month.
My question is not listed. Whom can I reach out to?
לשאלות כלליות ונושאים אחרים שלא מופיעים כאן, פנה ל <0> contact@fightpandemics.com. </0>
accountFAQ: כיצד ניתן להצטרף?

<0>To join the community as a user, click the "Menu" button and select the "Join Now/Sign In" option. There you will be able to join with your choice of email or social media credentials.</0><1>When you join the community, you will have unlimited access to view and create posts and comments on FightPandemics platform.</1>
כיצד אוכל לשנות את הפרופיל האישי שלי לפרופיל ארגון?

An organizational profile is tied to your individual profile. Once you create your individual profile, you can add as many organizational profiles as you'd like tied to that individual profile. Your sign in credentials will continue to be the email and password you used to join for the individual profile.
How can I change my organization profile to an individual profile?

You cannot change your organization profile to an individual profile. In order to create an organizational profile, you are required to have an individual profile. Once you create your individual profile, you can add as many organization profiles as you'd like, tied to that individual profile. Your sign in credentials will continue to be the email and password you used to join for the individual profile.
How can I reset my password?
לחץ על "כניסה" מדף הבית ואז לחץ על "שכחת סיסמה" ופעל לפי ההוראות
מדוע הסיסמה שלי אינה בתוקף?
נא בדוק אם הסיסמה שלך כוללת לפחות 8 תווים. אם כבר יש לך חשבון אך שכחת את סיסמת הכניסה שלך, לחץ על "כניסה" מדף הבית ואז עבור ל"שכחת סיסמה ".
נרשמתי ולא קיבלתי את הודעת האישור. מה אני עושה?
אם לא קיבלת הודעת אישור בדוא"ל, נסה את האפשרויות הבאות:
Check your Spam folder for the recovery email.
נסה את תהליך "שחזור סיסמה".
If the options above do not solve the problem, please feel free to reach out to our support team: <0>support@fightpandemics.com.</0>
כיצד ניתן למחוק/ לבטל את החשבון שלי?
If you wish to delete your account, please reach out to us at <0>support@fightpandemics.com.</0>
כיצד אוכל לעדכן את פרטי הפרופיל שלי?

From the menu in the upper right-hand corner, select "My Profile", then click on the pen icon at the top of your profile. You will be taken to a screen where you will be able to edit your profile information, and select "Save Changes" when you are complete.
כיצד אוכל לדווח על פוסט שגוי או פוגעני?
If you find a post that is incorrect or violates FightPandemics Code of Conduct, please email us at <0>support@fightpandemics.com.</0>
contectsFAQ: I want to become a partner or sponsor.
Please get in touch with our partnerships team at <0>partnerships@fightpandemics.com.</0>
אנא צרו איתנו קשר בכתובת < 0 > pr@fightpandemics.com. < / 0 >
We are sorry for that. Send us an email at <0>support@fightpandemics.com.</0> Since we are an all volunteer team, please expect at least 48 hours for a response.
אני רוצה ליצור קשר עם FightPandemics מסיבות אחרות.
For general questions and other issues not listed here, please reach out to <0>contact@fightpandemics.com.</0>
contactsFAQ: I want to become a partner or sponsor.
Please get in touch with our partnerships team at <0>partnerships@fightpandemics.com.</0>
אנא צרו איתנו קשר בכתובת < 0 > pr@fightpandemics.com. < / 0 >
אנו מצטערים על כך. שלח לנו דוא"ל לכתובת <0> support@fightpandemics.com. </0> מכיוון שאנחנו צוות מתנדבים, אנא צפה לפחות 48 שעות לתשובה.
אני רוצה ליצור קשר עם FightPandemics מסיבות אחרות.
לשאלות כלליות ונושאים אחרים שלא מופיעים כאן, אנא פנה אל <0> contact@fightpandemics.com. </0>

cookies.whatCookiesContent: <0>This Website uses ¨Cookies¨, and other similar mechanisms (hereinafter, Cookies). Cookies are files sent to a browser through a web server to record the activities of the User on a specific website or on all websites, apps and / or services on this website. The first purpose of Cookies is to provide the User with faster and more personalized access to the services offered. Cookies are associated only with an anonymous User and his/her computer and do not provide references that allow the deduction of the User's personal data.</0><1>The User may configure his/her browser to notify and reject the installation of Cookies sent by this website, without prejudice to the User's ability to access the Contents. However, we note that, in any case, the performance of the website may decrease. This website makes use of Web Bugs, which are tiny and transparent images inserted in the emails. When the User opens a newsletter of the Website, this image is downloaded along with the rest of the email content and allows to know if a specific email has been opened or not, as well as the IP address from which it was downloaded. FightPandemics uses this information to obtain statistics and carry out analytical studies on the reception of its emails by Users.</1>
cookies.typeCookies: TYPE, PURPOSE AND FUNCTIONING OF COOKIES
cookies.typeCookiesBegin: Cookies, depending on their permanence, can be divided into session or permanent Cookies. The first ones expire when the User closes the browser. The second ones expire depending on when the objective for which they serve is fulfilled or when they are manually deleted. Additionally, depending on your objective, the Cookies used by this Website can be classified as follows:
cookies.typeCookiesContent: <0>Technical cookies: These allow the user to navigate through a web page, platform or application and use the different options or services that exist there, such as, for example, control traffic and data communication, identify the session, access restricted access parts, remember the elements that make up an order, make the purchase process of an order, make the request for registration or participation in an event, use security elements during navigation, store content for dissemination of videos or sound or share content through social networks.</0><1>Analysis cookies: Those that are processed by us or by third parties, which allow to quantify the number of users and thus perform the measurement and statistical analysis of the use made by users of the services offered. For this, your browsing on our website is analyzed in order to improve the offer of products or services that we offer.</1><2>Advertising cookies: Are those that are processed by us or by third parties, allowing us to manage in the most efficient way possible the offer of the advertising spaces that are on the website, adapting the content of the advertisement to the content of the requested service or to the use that you make from our website. For this we can analyze your browsing habits on the Internet, and we can show you advertising related to your browsing profile.</2><3>Behavioral advertising cookies: These allow the management, in the most efficient way possible, of the advertising spaces that, where appropriate, the editor has included in a web page, application or platform from which it provides the requested service. These cookies store information on the behavior of users obtained through the continuous observation of their browsing habits, which allows developing a specific profile to display advertising based on it.</3>
cookies.typeCookiesEnd: The Website may use third-party services that may require the installation of Cookies on Users and that on behalf of FightPandemics, and will collect information for statistical purposes on the use of the Website by the user and for the provision of other services related to Website activity and other Internet services.
cookies.disableCookies: HOW TO DISABLE COOKIES AND WEB BUGS IN THE MAIN BROWSERS?
cookies.disableCookiesContent: It is normally possible to stop accepting browser cookies or stop accepting cookies from a particular service. All modern browsers allow you to change the configuration of Cookies. These settings are usually found in the ‘options’ or ‘Preferences’ of your browser menu. You can also configure your browser or email manager, as well as install free add-ons to prevent Web Bugs from downloading when opening an email. Use the following instructions according to your internet browser to change cookie preferences:
cookies.updateCookiesContent: FightPandemics may modify this Cookies Policy based on legislative, regulatory requirements, or with the purpose of adapting said policy to the instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency, therefore Users are advised to periodically visit this page to know the changes suffered in them. When there are significant changes in this Cookies Policy, Users will be notified either through the web or through email to the Users registered in the newsletter service.
cookies.cookieAlert: This site uses cookies to deliver our service and to show you relevant information. By using our site, you acknowledge that you have read and understand our <0>Cookies Policy</0>, <1>Privacy Policy</1>, and our <2>Terms & Conditions</2>. Your use of FightPandemics' Products is subject to these policies and terms.

TEMP: Your answers will not be stored or: התשובות שלך לא יאוחסנו ולא ישותפו. זה רק כלי לעזור לעולם.
TEMP: Yes, I am experiencing at least on: כן, אני חווה לפחות אחד מהתסמינים האלה

TEMP: No, they do not have any of these: לא, אין להם אף אחד מהתסמינים האלה

TEMP: No, I don’t live in a long-term ca: לא, אני לא גר במתקן סיעודי
TEMP: No, they don’t live in a long-term: לא, הם לא גרים במתקן סיעודי
TEMP: This includes a hospital, emergenc: זה כולל בית חולים, חדר מיון, מסגרת רפואית אחרת או מתקן טיפול סיעודי. בחר כל מה שמתאים.

לפי התסמינים שדווחו, עליך לפנות לטיפול באופן מיידי.
תתקשר למספר החירום!

emptyInbox.p2: חזור אל לוח העזרה כדי למצוא הצעות או בקשות להגיב.

selectRoom.p1: תוכן ההודעה יופיע כאן לאחר שתבחר

selectRequest.p2: לאחר שתבחר אחת מבקשת ההודעות מתיבת הדואר הנכנס

messaging.didBlock: חסמת את {{username}} . בטל חסימה כדי לקבל מהם הודעות שוב.
messaging.wasBlocked: {{username}חסם אותך. אתה כבר לא יכול לשלוח להם הודעה.
messaging.acceptPropmt: האם תרצה לקבל את בקשת ההודעה? אינך יכול להשיב עד שתקבל את הבקשה.
messaging.deleteMessageText: ההודעה שנבחרה תימחק לתמיד מהמכשיר שלך ומהמכשיר של המקבל. האם אתה בטוח שברצונך למחוק?
messaging.blockText: על ידי בחירת אפשרות "חסום", {{username}} לא יוכל לשלוח לך הודעה או בקשת הודעה. אתה יכול לעבור להגדרות הודעה כדי לנהל חשבונות חסומים.
messaging.archiveText: אם תרצה לקרוא את השיחה שוב, תצטרך לעבור להגדרות ההודעות כדי לשחזר אותה.
messaging.sendSuccessText: הודעתך ל {{username}} בנוגע ל- " {{title}} " נשלחה בהצלחה.
messaging.sendFailedText: הודעתך שלך ל {{username}} הנוגעת ל- " {{title}} " לא נמסרה.
messaging.ignoreDialogMessage: בקשת ההודעה תימחק מהמכשיר שלך. האם אתה בטוח שאתה רוצה להתעלם?
messaging.blockDialogMessage: על ידי בחירה באפשרות "חסום", {{username}} לא יוכל לשלוח לך הודעה או בקשת הודעה. אתה יכול לעבור להגדרות הודעה כדי לנהל חשבונות חסומים.

unsubscribe.canceled: לא יבוצעו שינויים בהעדפות ההודעות שלך

notifications.reported: Your post <1>{{postTitle}}</1> violates our content policy and hence it was removed

moderation.reportPostSuccess: Thank you for your report! This post will be submitted for review.
moderation.postSuspected: This post received multiple reports and was held for review
moderation.youReported: You have reported this post. It will no longer be visible on your feed
moderation.keepPostConfirm: Are you sure you want to keep this post?

verification.verifyBody: We noticed that you haven’t verified your account. Click here to get started.
verification.stepStartBody: FightPandemics wants to keep our community open, honest, and safe. The blue verified badge next to user’s name lets people know that an account is authentic.
verification.stepSuccessBody: Your verification badge should appear on your profile in few moments
verification.stepCancelBody: You can always go back and verify you account at anytime!

nearestHsp.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your type of health facilities or location.
nearestHsp.shareLoc: Share your location if you want to see your nearest health facilities
nearestHsp.evalYourHealth: Evaluate your health and receive instructions and recommendations about
